page.title: 18Blackgang Fantasy Theme Park
page.content: Blackgang Chine Fantasy Theme Park is situated on the South Western tip of the Island. Originally opened to the public in 1843 by Alexander Dabell, it has been continuously developed by succeeding generations of the same family.Over the past 20 years,the gardens,perched on the cliffs 400ft.above dangerous Chale Bay,have become home for such diverse theme areas as a Cowboy Town,Jungle- land,Dinosaurs,Nurseryland and England's finest maze.The cliff form- ation is such that landslips are fre- quent and over the last 50 years some 300 yards of the park have been lost to the sea.In 1981,Blackgang Sawmill was opened and in 1984 "St.Catherine's Quay" was added. With these new feat- ures and continuing development,it is hoped that this top Island attraction will continue for years to come.
